sources.title: The Over-the-Hill Gang Rides Again
sources.description: The old-time comrades-in-arms join forces to sober up an old buddy, a down-and-out drunk, and restore his reputation. ItÂ´s the only movie where you can see Fred Astaire with a mustache!

metadata.Plot: Walter Brennan is back as the clever and funny over the hill Texas Ranger Nash Crawford. This time the gang must face corruption in their own home town. The gang put their heads together to clean up their town, take back the rule of law and rehabilitate the town lush (played by Fred Astaire) along with way.
metadata.Actors: Walter Brennan, Fred Astaire, Edgar Buchanan
